Airstrikes on October seventh two thousand one destroyed in a kind of training camp and several Taliban government targets alongside Afghan rebels Americans ousted the Taliban within weeks but at the top objective Osama bin Laden was found into a decade later hiding in neighboring Pakistan
Over Seventeen years of war the American for surged up to one hundred thousand troops and then back down to about fourteen thousand today the Taliban insurgency now hold sway over more Afghan territory than at any time since two thousand one and the U.S has sought peace talks with the Islamist movement
